SCENCE.NAME: INIT_CHIP
POWER_ON_L
SCENCE.VALUE: { # awinic # # power up # 0x04, 0xffff, 0x0244, 0x00, 0x00, # mute disable # 0x08, 0xffff, 0xa00e, 0x00, 0x00, # read the interrupt symbol to clean the interrupt flags and close int # 0x00, 0xffff, 0x0000, 0x00, 0x05, 0x01, 0xffff, 0x0000, 0x00, 0x05, 0x02, 0xffff, 0x0000, 0x00, 0x05, 0x03, 0xffff, 0x0000, 0x00, 0x05}
